definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be dry, dried up (cf. [[יׇבֵשׁ]]) (Aram. [[חֲרוֹב]] be dry, [[חוּרְבָּא]] drought);—
of ground, be freed from waters of flood [[פְּנֵי חָאֲדָמָה]] ´[[ח]] Ge 8:13 b (J).

of waters, be dried up, taken away; of waters of flood Ge 8:13 a (P); of Nile [[וְנׇהָר]] [[יֶחֱרַב וְיׇבֵשׁ]] Is 19:5 (‖[[וְנִשְּׁתוּ־מַיִם מֵהַיׇּם]]), v. same combination Job 14:11 (‖[[אָֽזְלו מַיִם מִנִּי־יׇם]]); Is 19:6 (‖[[דָּֽלֲלוּ]]) Is 44:27 (‖[[הוֹבִישׁ]]); of Red Sea Ps 106:9; fig. of Ephraim's freshness and vigour Ho 13:15.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[לאׁ חׂרָָבוּ]] Ju Jdg 16:7, Jdg 16:8, of fresh bow-strings (of gut, v. Bla).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֶחֱרִיב]] Na 1:4, of ´[[י]]'s drying up rivers (‖[[וַיַּבְּשֵׁהוּ]]), perh. also Is 11:15 (for MT [[החרים]]) v. LXX SyrVer Vulgate Targum; [[וְהַחֲרַבְתִּ֫י]] the Euphrates Je 51:36 (‖[[הוֹבַשְׁתִּי]]); Impf. [[אַחֲרִיב יׇם]] Is 50:2, subj. ´[[י]], I dry up a sea (‖[[אָשִׂים נְהָרוֹת מִדְבָּר]]); [[אַחְרִב]] Is 37:25 = [[אַחֲרִב]] 2Ki 19:24, of king of Assyria drying up rivers of Egypt; Pt. fs. [[הַמַּחֲרֶבֶת]] Is 51:10 of ´[[י]]'s arm drying up (Red) Sea.
